description: Chance of getting nothing, a pair, 2 pair, 3 of a kind, other straight, other flush, full house, 4 of a kind, other straight flush, or a royal flush in poker is 1 in a(n) (rounded to nearest integer).
references: J. Scarne, Scarne's Complete Guide to Gambling, Simon and Schuster, 1961, p. 582.
links: Index entries for sequences related to poker
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
